text: Labels Unlimited is a series of books designed to give an illustrated overview of influential record labels. == Publications == *Warp by Rob Young (Black Dog Publishing, 2005: ) *Rough Trade by Rob Young (Black Dog Publishing, 2006: ) *Ace by David Stubbs (Author) & Rob Young (Editor) (Black Dog Publishing, 2007: ) *Immediate Records by Simon Spence (Black Dog Publishing, 2008: ) *Ninja Tune: 20 Years of Beats & Pieces by Stevie Chick (Author) & Peter Quicke (Editor) (Black Dog Publishing, 2010: ) Category:Series of books
title: Labels Unlimited
